key.name: development-tools
key.summary: Enable internal tools useful for developers and testers from Alt-F2
key.description: Allows access to internal debugging and monitoring tools using the Alt-F2 dialog.

key.name: enabled-extensions
key.summary: Uuids of extensions to enable
key.description: Cinnamon extensions have a uuid property; this key lists extensions which should be loaded. disabled-extensions overrides this setting for extensions that appear in both lists. Append ! in front of uuid to override version check

key.name: extension-cache-updated
key.summary: [not used - obsolete]

key.name: enabled-applets
key.summary: Uuids of applets to enable
key.description: Cinnamon applets have a uuid property; this key lists applets which should be loaded. Append ! in front of uuid to override version check.

key.name: applet-cache-updated
key.summary: [not used - obsolete]

key.name: next-applet-id
key.summary: The next applet id to give the next added applet
key.description: Do not change manually.

key.name: next-desklet-id
key.summary: The next desklet id to give the next added desklet
key.description: Do not change manually.

key.name: enabled-desklets
key.summary: Uuids of desklets to enable
key.description: Cinnamon desklets have a uuid property; this key lists desklets which should be loaded. uuids should be put in the form uuid:id:x:y, where id is used to distinguish between multiple instances of the same desklet. Append ! in front of uuid to override version check.

key.name: desklet-cache-updated
key.summary: [not used - obsolete]

key.name: enabled-search-providers
key.summary: Uuids of search providers to enable
key.description: Cinnamon search providers have a uuid property; this key lists search providers which should be loaded.

key.name: desklet-snap
key.summary: Whether desklets "snap" to a grid position
key.description: Enabling this allows desklets' position to be snapped into a regular grid

key.name: desklet-snap-interval
key.summary: The interval between each possible grid position when desklets "snap"
key.description: If desklet-snap is enabled, the possible positions of desklets will be all integer multiples of the value of "desklet-snap-size"

key.name: lock-desklets
key.summary: Locks the current position of all desklets and prevents dragging

key.name: panels-enabled
key.summary: List of panels used
key.description: Panels are listed in the following format: panelID:monitor:position, where monitor is the monitor number (0 for primary), and position is either top or bottom

key.name: panels-autohide
key.summary: Auto-hide panel
key.description: Whether the panel autohides or not.

key.name: panels-show-delay
key.summary: Duration of the delay before a hidden panel is shown
key.description: Duration of the delay (in milliseconds)

key.name: panels-hide-delay
key.summary: Duration of the delay before a shown panel is hidden
key.description: Duration of the delay (in milliseconds)

key.name: panels-height
key.summary: Panel size
key.description: User-defined panel-height for panels. Note, this value may or may not be the true value in use at runtime, depending on any scaling that may be occurring (on hidpi screens, for instance).

key.name: panel-zone-icon-sizes
key.summary: Per-zone fullcolor icon-size configuration
key.description: Panel zone configuration objects for fullcolor icon size.

key.name: panel-zone-symbolic-icon-sizes
key.summary: Per-zone symbolic icon-size configuration
key.description: Panel zone configuration objects for symbolic icon size. This is calculates size as a fraction of current color icon sizes

key.name: panel-zone-text-sizes
key.summary: Per-zone text-size configuration, values in point
key.description: Panel zone configuration objects for text, values are expressed as points. Setting to 0.0 will give control to the theme.

key.name: panel-scale-text-icons
key.summary: (Deprecated) Scale panel applet text and icons
key.description: (Deprecated) Retained to avoid applets who read the property from crashing Cinnamon

key.name: desktop-effects-on-dialogs
key.summary: Enable desktop effects on dialog boxes
key.description: Whether to enable desktop effects on dialog boxes.

key.name: desktop-effects-on-menus
key.summary: Enable desktop effects on Gtk menus
key.description: Whether to enable desktop effects on Gtk menus.

key.name: desktop-effects-workspace
key.summary: Enable desktop effects in the Cinnamon ui
key.description: This affects switching workspaces, expo and scale.

key.name: desktop-effects
key.summary: Enable desktop effects
key.description: Whether to enable desktop effects and window animations.

key.name: desktop-effects-close
key.summary: Effect used when closing windows
key.description: An effect: traditional, fly, none

key.name: desktop-effects-map
key.summary: Effect used when mapping windows
key.description: An effect: traditional, fly, fade, none

key.name: desktop-effects-minimize
key.summary: Effect used when minimizing windows
key.description: An effect: traditional, fly, fade, none

key.name: desktop-effects-change-size
key.summary: Whether to show an animation when unmaximizing/tiling/snapping windows

key.name: desktop-effects-sizechange-effect
key.summary: Effect used when maximizing windows
key.description: An effect: none

key.name: desktop-effects-sizechange-transition
key.summary: Transition used when maximizing windows
key.description: A Tweener transition

key.name: desktop-effects-sizechange-time
key.summary: Duration of the effect (in milliseconds)
key.description: Duration of the effect (in milliseconds)

key.name: window-effect-speed
key.summary: Speed multiplier for window-effects

key.name: startup-animation
key.summary: Whether the startup animation is enabled
key.description: Whether the startup animation is enabled

key.name: device-aliases
key.summary: Aliases given to battery powered fardware devices

key.name: desktop-layout
key.summary: (Deprecated) Layout style
key.description: (Deprecated) Layout styles - pre-2.6

key.name: date-format
key.summary: Date format
key.description: Format used for dates.

key.name: number-workspaces
key.summary: (Deprecated) Number of workspaces
key.description: (Deprecated) Number of Workspaces - pre-2.6, even though you shouldn't use it even on <2.6 releases. Use org.cinnamon.desktop.wm.preferences num-workspaces instead.

key.name: overview-corner
key.summary: Obsolete - unused
key.description: Obsolete - unused

key.name: hotcorner-layout
key.summary: Properties of hotcorners
key.description: Properties of hotcorners, in the form functionality:hover-enabled:hover-delay. The order in which properties are displayed is top left, top right, bottom left, bottom right.

key.name: panel-launchers
key.summary: Obsolete - unused
key.description: Obsolete - unused

key.name: enable-app-monitoring
key.summary: Whether to collect stats about applications usage
key.description: Cinnamon normally monitors active applications in order to present the most used ones (e.g. in launchers). While this data will be kept private, you may want to disable this for privacy reasons. Please note that doing so won't remove already saved data.

key.name: favorite-apps
key.summary: List of desktop file IDs for favorite applications
key.description: The applications corresponding to these identifiers will be displayed in the favorites area.

key.name: workspace-name-overrides
key.summary: (Deprecated) List of non-default workspace names
key.description: (Deprecated) The user-set names of the workspaces. Deprecated since 2.6. Use org.cinnamon.desktop.wm.preferences workspace-names instead.

key.name: workspace-osd-visible
key.summary: Enable or disable the workspace OSD
key.description: Whether the name of the workspace shows up on the screen when activated or not.

key.name: workspace-expo-view-as-grid
key.summary: Display the Expo view as a grid
key.description: When enabled the Expo view will be displayed as a grid.

key.name: disabled-open-search-providers
key.summary: disabled OpenSearch providers

key.name: command-history
key.summary: History for command (Alt-F2) dialog

key.name: looking-glass-history
key.summary: History for the looking glass dialog

key.name: no-adjacent-panel-barriers
key.summary: Whether to omit pointer barriers between adjacent panels.

key.name: panel-edit-mode
key.summary: Panel edit mode
key.description: A mode for the user to drag and drop applets and modify the look of the desktop

key.name: panel-launchers-draggable
key.summary: Obsolete

key.name: alttab-switcher-style
key.summary: ALT-tab switcher style
key.description: Controls the style of the ALT-tab window switcher. Can be any combination of "icons", "preview" and "thumbnails", separated by "+".

key.name: alttab-switcher-enforce-primary-monitor
key.summary: Enforce displaying the alt-tab switcher on the primary monitor instead of the active one

key.name: alttab-minimized-aware
key.summary: Move minimized windows to the end of the appSwitcher

key.name: alttab-switcher-delay
key.summary: Duration of the effect (in milliseconds)
key.description: Duration of the effect (in milliseconds)

key.name: alttab-switcher-show-all-workspaces
key.summary: Show all windows from all workspaces

key.name: bring-windows-to-current-workspace
key.summary: not used - lives in org.cinnamon.muffin now

key.name: prevent-focus-stealing
key.summary: [unused] Prevents windows that request user attention from stealing focus
key.description: This setting is no longer used.

key.name: desklet-decorations
key.summary: The decoration level of the desklets

key.name: enable-edge-flip
key.summary: Whether edge flip is enabled

key.name: edge-flip-delay
key.summary: Duration of the delay before switching the workspace
key.description: Duration of the delay (in milliseconds)

key.name: cinnamon-settings-advanced
key.summary: Whether advanced mode is enabled in cinnamon-settings

key.name: run-dialog-show-completions
key.summary: Whether or not to show possible completions in the run dialog (Alt-F2)

key.name: run-dialog-aliases
key.summary: Aliases for the Alt-F2 dialog
key.description: Aliases for use in the Alt-F2 dialog. This is a list of strings of the form a:b, where an instance of "a" is to be replaced with "b". Replacement is only performed on the first word.

key.name: show-media-keys-osd
key.summary: Whether the media keys osd is disabled or its relative display size
key.description: Allows setting of the default size of the media keys osd or disables it completely. Possible values are "small", "medium", "large", or "disabled".

key.name: startup-icon-name
key.summary: The logo to use in the startup animation
key.description: An icon name or absolute path to an icon, which will be used in the startup animation. If this is left empty, only a black screen will display.

key.name: allow-other-notification-handlers
key.summary: If true, Cinnamon will no longer attempt to be the session notification handler.

key.name: system-icon
key.summary: The logo to use in the system info settings
key.description: An icon name or absolute path to an icon, which will be used for the system icon in the "System Info" settings app. . Disabled if no value is set.

key.name: enable-vfade
key.summary: Enable the fade effect in Cinnamon scrollviews
key.description: Whether the vfade effect is enabled or not

key.name: show-snap-osd
key.summary: Show the tile/snap OSD
key.description: Hide the snap OSD.

key.name: show-tile-hud
key.summary: Show the tile HUD
key.description: Hide the tile HUD.

key.name: enable-indicators
key.summary: not used

key.name: demands-attention-ignored-wm-classes
key.summary: unused

key.name: demands-attention-passthru-wm-classes
key.summary: WM class names to always give focus to in windowAttentionHandler.js

key.name: app-menu-icon-name
key.summary: The default icon name of the application menu
key.description: Controls the default icon name used by the application menu.

key.name: app-menu-label
key.summary: The default label of the application menu
key.description: Controls the default label used by the application menu.

key.name: hoverclick-action
key.summary: The type of mouse action to be performed using hoverkey (single, double, drag, secondary)

key.name: hoverclick-layout
key.summary: This defines the layout for the hoverkey window - format is vertical | horizontal :: icons | text | both

key.name: hoverclick-position
key.summary: Stores the position of the hoverclick window so it can be restored there later - format is x::y

key.name: name
key.summary: Theme name
key.description: The name of the theme

key.name: theme-cache-updated
key.summary: [not used - obsolete]

key.name: symbolic-relative-size
key.summary: Relative size of symbolic icons to the zone's icon size

key.name: gtk-version-scrollbar-multiplier
key.summary: Relative size of the scrollbars between gtk3 and gtk2 - the set value is multiplied by this for the gtk2 value

key.name: keyboard-type
key.summary: Which keyboard to use
key.description: The type of keyboard to use.

key.name: activation-mode
key.summary: How the keyboard becomes activated
key.description: Can be: on-demand: display the keyboard only at user demand, either when the applet is clicked, or a keyboard shortcut is used. accessible: display the keyboard any time an input field becomes the desktop keyboard focus.

key.name: keyboard-size
key.summary: The size of the keyboard. Set this value to X for the keyboard to take 1/x of the screen.
key.description: The size of the keyboard. Set this value to X for the keyboard to take 1/x of the screen.

key.name: keyboard-position
key.summary: Keyboard position
key.description: Keyboard position.

key.name: framerate
key.summary: Framerate used for recording screencasts.
key.description: The framerate of the resulting screencast recordered by Cinnamon's screencast recorder in frames-per-second.

key.name: pipeline
key.summary: The gstreamer pipeline used to encode the screencast
key.description: Sets the GStreamer pipeline used to encode recordings. It follows the syntax used for gst-launch. The pipeline should have an unconnected sink pad where the recorded video is recorded. It will normally have a unconnected source pad; output from that pad will be written into the output file. However the pipeline can also take care of its own output - this might be used to send the output to an icecast server via shout2send or similar. When unset or set to an empty value, the default pipeline will be used. This is currently 'videorate ! vp8enc quality=10 speed=2 threads=%T ! queue ! webmmux' and records to WEBM using the VP8 codec. %T is used as a placeholder for a guess at the optimal thread count on the system.

key.name: file-extension
key.summary: File extension used for storing the screencast
key.description: The filename for recorded screencasts will be a unique filename based on the current date, and use this extension. It should be changed when recording to a different container format.

key.name: mode
key.summary: Background mode
key.description: This key defines the whether the desktop background shows one single wallpaper, a slideshow or an online slideshow (Flickr).

key.name: slideshow-folder
key.summary: Folder to use for the slideshow
key.description: This key defines the folder to use for the slideshow.

key.name: slideshow-recursive
key.summary: Whether to list files recursively for the slideshow
key.description: This key defines whether to list files recursively for the slideshow.

key.name: slideshow-delay
key.summary: Delay for the slideshow
key.description: This key defines the delay for the slideshow.

key.name: switch-enabled
key.summary: Whether to play a sound when switching workspaces
key.description: Whether to play a sound when switching workspaces.

key.name: switch-file
key.summary: Which sound to play when switching workspaces
key.description: Which sound to play when switching workspaces.

key.name: close-enabled
key.summary: Whether to play a sound when closing windows
key.description: Whether to play a sound when closing windows.

key.name: close-file
key.summary: Which sound to play when closing windows
key.description: Which sound to play when closing windows.

key.name: map-enabled
key.summary: Whether to play a sound when mapping windows
key.description: Whether to play a sound when mapping windows.

key.name: map-file
key.summary: Which sound to play when mapping windows
key.description: Which sound to play when mapping windows.

key.name: minimize-enabled
key.summary: Whether to play a sound when minimizing windows
key.description: Whether to play a sound when minimizing windows.

key.name: minimize-file
key.summary: Which sound to play when minimizing windows
key.description: Which sound to play when minimizing windows.

key.name: maximize-enabled
key.summary: Whether to play a sound when maximizing windows
key.description: Whether to play a sound when maximizing windows.

key.name: maximize-file
key.summary: Which sound to play when maximizing windows
key.description: Which sound to play when maximizing windows.

key.name: unmaximize-enabled
key.summary: Whether to play a sound when unmaximizing windows
key.description: Whether to play a sound when unmaximizing windows.

key.name: unmaximize-file
key.summary: Which sound to play when unmaximizing windows
key.description: Which sound to play when unmaximizing windows.

key.name: tile-enabled
key.summary: Whether to play a sound when tiling windows
key.description: Whether to play a sound when tiling windows.

key.name: tile-file
key.summary: Which sound to play when tiling windows
key.description: Which sound to play when tiling windows.

key.name: login-enabled
key.summary: Whether to play a sound during login
key.description: Whether to play a sound during login.

key.name: login-file
key.summary: Which sound to play when logging in
key.description: Which sound to play during login.

key.name: logout-enabled
key.summary: Whether to play a sound during logout
key.description: Whether to play a sound during logout.

key.name: logout-file
key.summary: Which sound to play when logging out
key.description: Which sound to play during logout.

key.name: plug-enabled
key.summary: Whether to play a sound when a device is plugged
key.description: Whether to play a sound when a device is plugged.

key.name: plug-file
key.summary: Which sound to play when a device is plugged
key.description: Which sound to play when a device is plugged.

key.name: unplug-enabled
key.summary: Whether to play a sound when a device is unplugged
key.description: Whether to play a sound when a device is unplugged.

key.name: unplug-file
key.summary: Which sound to play when a device is plugged
key.description: Which sound to play when a device is unplugged.

key.name: notification-enabled
key.summary: Whether to play a sound when showing notifications
key.description: Whether to play a sound when showing notifications.

key.name: notification-file
key.summary: Which sound to play when showing notifications
key.description: Which sound to play when showing notifications.

key.name: launcher-list
key.summary: Desktop files of the applications to be shown on desktop
key.description: The "launchers" desklet provides a method to show a launcher on the desktop This list maps the desklet id to the desktop file of application.

key.name: bindings
key.summary: Keybinding array for runtime keybinding.

key.name: action-id
key.summary: Action id for keybinding

key.name: name
key.summary: deprecated - moved to org.cinnamon.desktop.keybindings

key.name: binding
key.summary: deprecated - moved to org.cinnamon.desktop.keybindings

key.name: command
key.summary: deprecated - moved to org.cinnamon.desktop.keybindings

key.name: memory-limit-enabled
key.summary: Whether to restart Cinnamon when it reachs the memory limit

key.name: memory-limit
key.summary: Memory limit (in MB)

key.name: check-frequency
key.summary: Time between each checks (in seconds)
